languages.text: Убедил{mf||а} Идиру в том, что ее единственное спасение — слиться с голосами.
Convinced Idira that her only salvation was to become one with the voices.
languages.original_text: Убедил{mf||а} Идиру в том, что ее единственное спасение — слиться с голосами.

traits.locale_text: Convinced Idira that her only salvation was to become one with the voices.

languages.text: 你让伊迪拉相信，她唯一的救赎就是与这些声音融为一体。
languages.original_text: Convinced Idira that her only salvation was to become one with the voices.

traits.locale_text: 你让伊迪拉相信，她唯一的救赎就是与这些声音融为一体。

languages.text: Idira überzeugt, dass ihre einzige Erlösung darin liegt, eins mit den Stimmen zu werden.
languages.original_text: Convinced Idira that her only salvation was to become one with the voices.

traits.locale_text: Idira überzeugt, dass ihre einzige Erlösung darin liegt, eins mit den Stimmen zu werden.

languages.text: Vous avez convaincu Idira que son seul salut était de s'unir aux voix.
languages.original_text: Convinced Idira that her only salvation was to become one with the voices.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez convaincu Idira que son seul salut était de s'unir aux voix.

languages.text: Has convencido a Idira de que la única salvación es unirse a las voces.
languages.original_text: Convinced Idira that her only salvation was to become one with the voices.

traits.locale_text: Has convencido a Idira de que la única salvación es unirse a las voces.

languages.text: イディラに、唯一の救いは声と一体化することだと確信させた。
languages.original_text: Convinced Idira that her only salvation was to become one with the voices.

traits.locale_text: イディラに、唯一の救いは声と一体化することだと確信させた。

languages.text: İdira'yı tek kurtuluş yolunun seslerle bir olmak olduğuna ikna ettin.
languages.original_text: Convinced Idira that her only salvation was to become one with the voices.

traits.locale_text: İdira'yı tek kurtuluş yolunun seslerle bir olmak olduğuna ikna ettin.
